programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Lou's new business relationship with Matt starts to unravel when a botched job puts a serious strain on the company.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Tensions between Lou and Matt continue to boil when Matt enlists his daughter's aid on another job.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: A new rift between Matt and the rest of the crew puts the fate of the team in question.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: On this season finale, Matt and Lou have their final confrontation and the team loses a member.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: On this season premiere, Sonia's rehabilitation from her gunshot wound takes a shocking turn.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia's recovery takes another unexpected turn when she goes too far with a debtor.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Things get a lot more complicated for the team when Sonia puts herself on the business end of a knife.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: The repo team confronts the toughest challenge yet: one-on-one interviews with an anger management specialist.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect?

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: The team's work with the anger management specialist starts to pay off with disastrous consequences.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy crash a meeting to ask for a car, but instead they get an angry old man with a rifle.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy disrupt a wild debtor, clash with workers, and face a repo that ends in destruction.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Lou, Sonia repo from yuppie; Sonia, Matt, Froy reclaim from hippie; Matt, Sonia confront fire dancers.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy show off their best moves against a team of dance instructors.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Lou and Sonia are caught in a desperate situation when the owner of their target car is struck.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou find themselves in the middle of nowhere in a tooth-and-nail fight with a trio of stargazers.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia are overwhelmed by a swarm of cheerleaders.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Lou and Froy repo an airplane, but Froy finds himself in handcuffs when Lou takes off.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy repo a car from a girl whose roommate has been keeping two very big secrets.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: While attempting a repo of a "green energy" bio-diesel vehicle, Froy's lack of knowledge sets the bus ablaze.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt go to a garden center to repo a forklift, but a language barrier causes chaos.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: With the pressure of Froy's legal problems mounting, the team does everything they can to convince him to hire a lawyer. Froy and Matt confront a misogynist frat boy with a dark secret, Sonia and Froy wrangle with a squadron of costumed rally racers, and Lou, Matt, and Froy get the surprise of a lifetime when they're faced with a truck-full of vicious gangsters.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Froy meets with a lawyer, but his legal troubles are worse than expected. Sonia and Froy confront a debtor who uses a homeless man in his ploy to keep his car. Then, Sonia and Froy discover one debtor's alcoholism is only a farce to cover a bigger secret. And finally, the team's attempt to repo fifteen bikes from a gym is not the morale booster Lou had hoped for.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: While Froy waits on news from his lawyer about his warrant in Texas, he considers taking matters into his own hands. Lou and Froy bust some slick moves in an attempt to wrangle a car from a debtor who is prepared to battle. Then, when one woman behaves like a child, Matt puts her in timeout, but worries he may have gone too far. And finally, Lou, Matt, and Froy take on an jealous husband with deadly aim.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy head to Texas to clear Froy's name, but things take a turn for the worse and Froy finds himself in more trouble than he can handle. Back in LA, Lou and Lyndah repo a car from a deceptive charity worker, and Lou is left to protect the girls from two knife wielding debtors who will go to any lengths to keep their vehicles.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: When a debtor and his friends resort to baseball bats, chaos erupts, and Lou, Lyndah and Sonia fight not only with them, but also with each other. Down in Texas, Matt and Froy wait to clear up Froy's warrant and get in way over their heads working for a local repo team. Meanwhile, Lou decides to re-hire Frankie despite Sonia and Lyndah's objections, but first Lou wants to see how Frankie fares when faced with the temptation in the form of strippers and alcohol.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Down in Texas, Matt and Froy are staking out a cement mixer, but their repo turns disastrous when an innocent bystander gets showered in concrete. In LA, Frankie takes the reins with an alcoholic debtor, and Lou and Sonia deal with a diva who pushes Sonia to her breaking point.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.sub-title: Couple of Yups/Bottled Feelings/A Screw Loose
programme.desc: First, Frankie and Lyndah find themselves in a fancy neighborhood, dealing with a pair of uptight yuppies with well-coordinated clothes and well-coordinated attacks. Then Lyndah goes wild when a truck-driving debtor gets physical with Sonia. And finally, Matt and Froy face down a backwoods Texan with secret ammunition.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home. Back in LA, Frankie's wild antics jeopardize a repo and push Lyndah to her breaking point.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy set out to repo a truck from a wealthy Texan, but their mission backfires when the Sheriff arrives with a new arrest warrant that will send Froy away for good.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Lou takes his new guys on their very first repo but, when the debtors attack with chainsaws, Ronnie and Carlos are left to fend for themselves.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Lou plans an elaborate sting operation to infiltrate a cult, but everything goes awry when the new guys aren't prepared and Matt is left picking up the pieces.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Sonia repo from a stranded motorist who rallies the neighborhood around his cause and incites a full on revolt. Ronnie and Carlos set out on their first unsupervised repo, but their desire to impress is quickly derailed when an erratic debtor lets loose with pepper spray.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: The team gets back to work, but have their anger management sessions had any effect? Sonia and Lyndah confront a gang of roller derby girls who've got the skills to protect their car.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia and Carlos put their best performance in when they attempt to repossess a vehicle from a pair of silver-painted robot men.? Matt and Froy need a second opinion when they run into a debtor with a questionable claim about a life-threatening illness.?

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Froy and Matt have to wrangle with some angry clowns when they try to repossess a bouncy castle. Meanwhile, Lou and Sonia lose patience with a debtor over a recycling truck.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: When Carlos plays a repossession prank that almost lands Matt and Froy in jail, Lou tasks Froy with burying the hatchet.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy deal with an unbalanced debtor who threatens to take down the entire company, while Matt and Ronnie take on children's book vendors who are up to no good.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take the opportunity to enact revenge on Ronnie and Carlos; a repo at a car wash gets out of hand; Lou's big mistake on a repo results in a debtor bringing the fight to their front door in a shoot out.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Reeling from the shootout, Lou tracks down one of the culprits and enacts and elaborate plot of revenge with the help of Froy and Carlos.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: A jazz musician sets off Sonia and punches are thrown as Ronnie tries to manage the mayhem, and Matt and Sonia wrestle to bring deluded actors back to reality.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy repo a car from an anger management meeting, Froy suffers the consequences of taking on a violent rage-aholic.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: When Rusty leads Sonia and Ronnie on a wild goose chase, Sonia loses her cool and puts her foot down with Lou.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: The team's work with anger management starts to pay off - with disastrous consequences. Matt and Sonia get into a standoff with a wealthy divorcee, his daughter and her raging boyfriend.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Lou struggles to pick up the pieces after the accident leaves him needing Sonia more than ever. Lou and Carlos deal with a big man in a tiny car, but when Carlos lets his guard down he's delivered some serious blows.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia returns, but not before putting the team on probation and laying some ground rules.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Sonia take on an award winning fencing coach, but all bets are off when his students go on the offensive with real swords.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy take on a grungy fisherman, but when he isn't afraid to damage his own boat, Froy is the one who is sinking fast.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: When Matt and Froy go missing, Sonia is on a mission to figure out what they've got up their sleeves.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Sonia and Froy repo a hummer from a bachelorette who is down to party, but when the cops arrive it's the repo team who is in for a shock.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Froy are sent on a wild goose chase around L.A for a mini-van, and when they find their debtor selling contraband out of the trunk Matt is further convinced that Lyndah has been scheming against him.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: When Matt almost gets run down by a posse of graffiti-packing gangsters, he sets into motion a plan of revenge against Lyndah.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: After Ronnie suffers a near-fatal wound during an attack on the lot, he reconsiders his role in the repo business.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Ronnie's gotten a raise and a promotion, and Carlos's jealousy sends him looking for more appreciation. But when his quest for glory goes wrong, will it turn the entire team against him? Matt and Sonia wrangle with a small business owner with some violent cargo in the back of his truck, Sonia and Froy have some hard lessons for a bratty hipster, and Froy and Carlos get in too deep with a dockworker who will destroy anything and anyone who messes with his car.

programme.title: Operation Repo
programme.desc: Matt and Ronnie repo a Porsche from a maniac; Carlos and Ronnie come face to face during their repo of a cable van.
